title: How the US and UK ban on devices in planes will impact Indians - Times of India

organizations.name: indians - times of india eastern oklahoma

text: Eastern Oklahoma wildfire 99% contained How the US and UK ban on devices in planes will impact Indians Both the US and the UK recently barred passengers travelling on US and UK-bound flights from some West Asian and North African countries respectively, from carrying devices other than smartphones in carry-on baggage. They have citied heightened security as the reason for the restrictions. Here is a look at the airports and airlines that will be affected and how the ban will impact Indians heading to the US. TNN | Updated: Mar 23, 2017, 03.14 PM IST Both the US and the UK recently barred passengers travelling on US and UK-bound flights from some West Asian and North African countries respectively, from carrying devices other than smartphones in carry-on baggage. They have citied heightened security as the reason for the restrictions. Here is a look at the airports and airlines that will be affected and how the ban will impact Indians heading to the US.
